hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer

bone

definition: incus or anvil bone of middle ear, passing sound vibration from malleus hammer bone to stapes stirrup bone
stapes or stirrup bone of middle ear, passing sound vibration to the inner ear

ossicles (in the middle ear)/also written 聽小骨|听小骨
